name: Diagnostic-lab
body:
A Project Report

On

Medical Diagnostic Lab
Management


Submitted for the partial fulfillment of
BACHELOR OF TECHNOLOGY


























ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

We express deep sense of gratitude and indebtness to out trainer sir Mr. Amit Jayaswal and our guide Mr Gaurav Nirwal, under whose guidance, valuable suggestions, constant encouragement and kind supervision, the present project was carried out.

We also wish to express our sincere thanks to our friends who helped directly or indirectly by giving their valuable suggestions.







				

























CONTENTS



1).Introduction
o	Purpose
o	Scope
o	Definitions, Acronyms and Abbreviations
o	References
o	Overview 

2) General description
o	Product perspective
o	Product function
o	User characteristics
o	General constraints

3) Functional Requirements
o	Forms for adding & viewing/editing 
o	Reports 

4) Preliminary Design
4.1)	Context Diagram
4.2)      DFD 0 Level
4.3)	Database Design

5) Hardware Requirement

6) Software Requirement
 
1. INTRODUCTION

1.1 Purpose:-                                    
In our daily life it is a General Practice to go Doctor’s clinic and generally doctor Prescribe some Medical Test. Then we go to a Medical Lab Diagnostic Center.
              
Medical Lab Diagnostic Center is a place where all kind of medical test conducted. Medical Lab Diagnostic Center always feels requirement of a Software system which help in keeping records and reporting.

Thus Medical Lab Diagnostic Center Management system is very helpful   to overcome the general problem.

1.2 Scope:-
	Maintaining the masters like test department, category, Group, Test name.
	Maintaining the Patient Record.
	Maintaining Patient Result.
	Maintaining Patient Report.
	Maintaining commission of Doctor.
	Maintaining report of doctor’s commission.




2. General Description

2.1 Project perspective
The initially this module is proposed to be developed as an independent module. It is proposed to link it with the patient/doctor evaluation module, commission information system, and report generation system in future.

2.2 Product Functions
Some of the important functions proposed to be developed are:
•	Maintaining the masters like test department, category, Group, Test name.

•	Maintaining the Patient Record.

•	Maintaining Lab Master Data
•	Maintaining Doctor Master Data
         Maintaining Test Department Master Data

 
2.3 User Characteristics
The main users of the system are Administrator, Patient, and Doctor.
System Administrator: The administrator is responsible for managing database, user management, deletion (which is not allowed to other type of users). An administrator has all rights in every module.
Patient: The Faculty can view all the information (Test Details, Test rate, Department details etc). The faculty can also receive the the test report.
Doctor:-The doctor send the patient to the diagnostic center and receive the commission from the Lab.. 

2.4 General constraints
•	Should Run on the Windows XP/Windows 2000 Platform.
•	Number of Test should not exceed the capacity of the maximum capacity..
•	Test availability.
 

3.Functional Requirements


1.	Classification of medical test based on
(i)	Department
(ii)	Category
(iii)	Group
(iv)	Test Name
2.	Administrative Login

3.	Operator Main
4.   Adding the Department.
4.	Adding Category.
5.	Adding Group.
6.	Adding Test
7.	Adding Doctor and doctor’s commission
8.	Patient Registration.
9.	Patient Result Inserting.
10.	Patient Report Generation
11.	Doctor’s Commission Report
12.	Search Patient respect to Patient Id, Patient Name, and date.
13.	Search Doctor respect to doctor doctor_id,doctor_Name,Comission Per
14.	Remove Doctor.
15.	Remove Patient.
 

3.1. The Form which are made in the project are as follows:-

Login form:-
                                  This form is used for administrative login. The user enters the username and password, if username and password matched with the database then Administrator Home Page will show. 

 
 
 (2)Administrator Home:-
                                        This page is used for nagivation purpose. If we click on any button then particular form will display.


  
 (3)Add Department:- 
                                  When user enters the Department name and click on ok button then department will be added in the database.

 
  
 (4) Add Category:-
                               When user selects any department from the list and enter the category then category will be inserted in selected department.


  
 (5) Add Group:-
                          When user selects department and category then enter the group name then group will be added in category.

 
 
(5)Add Test:-
                      When user select department, category, test group then enter the test-name, test-rate, test normal value and click on ok button then add will add in database in particular category.



  
 (6)Add Doctor:-
                        This form is used for doctor master entries.User enter doctor name and commission Percentage and click on ok button ,then doctor will save in masters.

 
 
 (7)Patient Registration:-
                                        User fill patient’s personal information, test information and select referred doctor and click on submit button then patient becomes registered.
 
 
8) Report by Doctor:
			This page is used to accept the result of the test conducted on the patient. It is provided by the doctor.

 














 (9)Patient Report:-
                            This page is used to submit the Patient ID and name whose report is to be seen.

 






















This page displays the report of the patient whose ID and name was submitted in the previous page.


  
 (10)Doctor Commission Report:-
                                               This page will show the report of doctor’s list with their name, commission per, commission amount.


 

















11) Modify Fields:
			User can change (edit) the names of existing departments, doctors using this page. It also lets the user to create new account for operating.

 
 
4. Preliminary Design

4.1 Context Diagram


















		






 

4.2  DFD 0 Level:-



















 








 


4.3 Database

1. Login Table

Sr.No.	Field Name
	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	username	varchar2	30		
2	password	varchar2	30		



2. Deptartment Table
	
Sr.No.	Field Name
	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Dept_ID	Number	10	PK	
2	Dept_Name	Varchar2	30		

3.AddCategory Table
 
Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Cat_ID	Number	10	PK	
2	Dept_ID	Number	10	Fk	
3	Cat_Name	Varchar2	25		

4. AddGroup Table

Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Group_ID	Number	10	PK	
2	Cat_id	Number	10	FK	
3	Dept_ID	Number	10	FK	
4	Group_Name	Varchar2	25		

5 AddDoctor Table	

Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	doc_id	Number	10	PK	
2	doc_name	Varchar2	30
		
3	com_per	Number	3		
4.	com_amt		5		

6. AddTest Table 

Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Test_ID	Number	10	PK	
2	Group_ID	Number	10	FK	
3	Cat_id	Number	10	FK	
4	Dept_ID	Number	10	FK	
5	Test_Rate	Number	7,2		
6	Normal_Value	Number	5,2		Ex-proteen 8.9
7	Test_Name	Varchar2	50		

7 .PatientReg Table

Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Patient_ID	Number	10	PK	
2	Registration_Date	Date			
3	First_Name	Varchar2	50		
4	Last_Name	Varchar2	30		
5	address	Varchar2	200		
6	Sex	Varchar2	5		Male/Female
7	Age	Varchar2	2		
8	Contact No.	Varchar2	10		
9	Test_ID	Number	10	FK	
10	Group_ID	Number	10	FK	
11	Cat_id	Number	10	FK	
12	Dept_ID	Number	10	FK	


8. ReportByDoctor Table

Sr.No.	Field Name	Data Type	Size	Constraint	Description
1	Paitent_ID	Number	10	FK	
2	patient_name	Varchar2	50		
3	test_result	varchar2	50		



5. Hardware Requirement: 	Processor		:	Any Pentium Processor 	RAM		             :	Minimum 64 MB 
It is the minimum requirement, but here user cannot store data at another disk (because database product does not allow changing diskette).

In case of large volume of data, that general in commercial organization, following hardware configuration is recommended. Except the problem handling, it will possibly faster processing as a result offence of job.




6. Software Requirement:
 	OS			:	Windows-2000/XP/7 or Unix/Linux
JAVA			:	J2SDK 1.5.0 or Higher 	DATABASE		:	Oracle 8i or Higher
